body.name: Her Infuriating Earl: A Historical Regency Romance Novel (The Spinsters Club Book 3)
body.description: “You will not marry my sister.” “We’ll see about that…”Phoebe’s sole purpose is to protect her siblings. So when the most insufferable Earl becomes her sister’s suitor, Phoebe vows to scare him away. No matter how persistent he is, or how much turmoil he causes inside her…When Daniel finds his perfect Countess, there’s only one obstacle standing in his way: Phoebe. Yet even as she makes his life a living hell, her fiery eyes haunt his mind. Awakening an attraction Daniel has sworn to never feel. And it’s all because of the wrong sister…*If you like powerful Dukes, loving Duchesses and a marvelous depiction of the majestic Regency and Victorian era, then Her Infuriating Earl is the novel for you.An enchanting regency romance of 80,000 words (around 400 pages), written by Tiffany Baton and published by Cobalt Fairy.No cheating, no cliffhangers, and a sweet happily ever after.Grab "Her Infuriating Earl" today to discover Tiffany's fantastic story! Read more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They Pushed Each Others Buttons All The Way Up the Aisle
reviews.reviewText: The Infuriating Earl Book 3 in the Series Spinsters Club , Tiffany Baton has us on the edge with Spinsters Falling in Love. With Three down and possibly Two to go ! They might have been strong and determined women , but Love is a mush more Powerful force . She was content on not getting married . Taking care of her Twin Sisters , her Father, and the Family seemed to fill her life. The Earl needed an Heir to carry on his legacy. Only he believed that the male heirs were cursed to die young. So he did not want to marry someone he loves . Both protecting their hearts. ! To Love or Not To Love ? Which Will Hurt Less ?Phoebe Wilson was the eldest daughter to the Viscount of Woodholme . After her Mother died she made a promise to take care of her Twin Sisters . Since there Debut it became a lot harder . Trying to protect them and keeping them out of a scandal. They fought with ever turn.Daniel Barnet Earl of Westyork was a very savvy businessman . He traveled all over the world. He was now ready for a wife. Only he could not love her . Just a marriage of convenience.Daniel and Phoebe had a past. They each had friends in there inter circle. So socializing was not something new to them . Oh, they fought like cats and dogs. Yet there was something deep behind there relationship. Everyone around them felt something was happening . Only they were oblivious ! There is a Twist in the story of Love ! Can you put yourself first for happiness ? Gambling on Love for however long you have left in this world .There are quite a few sad moments, but maybe that is what helps to resolve for happiness attended !Two strong people finally leaning on one another for a Future in Love and Happiness ! Finding Love is always a Good Thing too Me ! A Lovely Enjoyable Story !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Her Infuriating Earl.
reviews.reviewText: He was irritating a very irritating earl, no one knows when they are dying. Thank goodness. No one will want do anything. They would stay in their houses and never leave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Phoebe and Daniel
reviews.reviewText: This is another story that is part of the Spinster’s series of books written by this creative author. All are engaging stories with unexpected romances that happen to women who have chosen to never marry. Each story is a standalone, and does not have any cliffhangers. This story surrounds Phoebe and Daniel. Acting as a mother to her two sisters, Phoebe is now seeking appropriate suitors for the girls. Daniel, believing he is cursed with an early death, seeks a wife that he will never love, to carry on his legacy. The few times in the past when Phoebe and Daniel’s paths cross, they clash and bicker. Daniel decides he wants to marry one of Phoebe’s sisters, but he must prove to her he is worthy to receive her blessing. Ms Baton creates a mesmerizing story, with a variety of characters trying to find their future happiness and happily ever after. Among the tension between Phoebe and Daniel, things suddenly begin to change. Everyone around them are aware except the squabbling couple. Then the author wisely weaves in unexpected drama to amp up the tension. A wonderful plot that is full of emotional turmoil and misunderstandings, with rich characters failing to see what is within their grasp. I enjoyed the story, and remain a fan of Ms Baton. I received a complimentary ARC, but I am voluntarily offering my personal opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars True Feelings Revealed
reviews.reviewText: Phoebe has been acting as a mother to her twin sisters, Johanna and Ellen, ever since their mother died. On top of that she has also been handling most of the finances for the estate as her father had not taken his wife’s death well and Phoebe was very good with math and handling financial matters. Phoebe was very protective of her sisters and this was very notable as far as finding suitors for them. Daniel did have a history with Phoebe as he always appeared to be awkward around her and had in fact managed to dump drinks on her on a number of occasions. At the last dance Daniel danced with Joanne as she was enthusiastic and a lot of fun but Phoebe was not at all happy about it. The story then continues with Daniel acting like he is going to court Johanna but he spends most of the time with Phoebe convincing himself that it is because he has to get her approval before he can court her sister. A lot of mixed feelings and also a stark view that Daniel holds about his future almost prevents him from acting upon his true feelings for Phoebe. We also have a bit of drama and then a realization that love could be lost unless acted upon before we finally get our happily ever after.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I liked books you wrote , its sweet but not to mushy. I like to go on to the next book like a continuation t pplo the next couples.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Protecting a sister
reviews.reviewText: Two sisters and one is the protector. The hero wants one of the sisters for his wife, but the heroine tries to protect her sister from him. There is a lot of bantering and some twists before it is all straightened out and we get the HEA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Never did the course of true love run smooth.
reviews.reviewText: Phoebe had it rough. All the self-sacrifice for her sisters was just sad. Her father was dreadfully absent in his duties. She had to manage the finances and govern her sisters while omitting her own pursuit of happiness. I felt sorry for her.Daniel on the other hand was a royal pain. He was so self centered. He demanded a bride who wouldn't love him just in case he died early.It took forever for these two to admit their feelings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Responsibility of The Eldest Child?
reviews.reviewText: As an eldest child I felt her challenge. She assumed her responsibility as daughter/mother admirably. This story shows us eldest daughters that it’s possible even under difficult circumstances to have a successful outcome. Would that we all could be as successful.
I love the Spinster Club series! It was nice to see phoebe fall in love and put herself first. Her sister are super selfish! Daniel was so sweet and awkward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: HE LOVED HER SO MUCH HE COULD NOT TELL HER - WHY ?
reviews.reviewText: LADY PHOEBE WILSON (23 YES OLD A MEMBER OF THE SPINSTER SOCIETY She has two younger twin sisters Johanna and Ellen their mother died when they were 7YRS old, Phoebe has been a mother to them and they are now 19 and ready for the debut into society both were excited and were hoping for suitors.DANIEL BARNET-EARL OF WESTYORK - Was attending the house party in the hope of finding a wife - preferably someone he did not love or who had no affection for him ( he wanted an heir)Unfortunately the young lady he selected was Joanna (Phoebe young sister).THEN THE GAMES BEGIN ( OR SHOULD I SAY THE HEARTACHE).I LOVED THIS STORY BRILLIANT CHARACTERS COULD NOT PUT IT DOWN - SO MUCH GOING ON. I read the first two books in this series - this was just as good.READ IT YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTEDI received an ARC copy

It had a slow start but when Phoebe and Daniel started to admit their love for each other that changed everything. It started to grow in a cautious way. The way she wrote this part of the story, it drew you into the it, making it hard to put down. She breathes life into the story especially the characters. My favourite is the twins. They are full of mischief and life. I can't wait for Ellen's story. It will be interesting from the bad experience she had to the good ones yet to come. I look forward to more of the spinster club. They are a interesting group of people. K

reviews.reviewerName: Kindle Customer Carol pike (love regency fiction)with a good story line.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Enjoyed the Rappore between the main characters, not too much silliness about romance but had a bit of humour in the story. Glad of a happy ending although it took a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoyed this story. Phoebe is determined to protect her sisters, Julia and Ellen, and tries to keep unsuitable men away. She considers Daniel to be a rake. Whenever they meet, she always seems to argue with Daniel. She is determined to stop any relationship developing. .However, her plans do not run smoothly when sparks fly between Daniel and Phoebe instead of Julia. I really enjoyed the arguments between them and how they both tried to fight their feelings. This story has an elopement, and unexpected twists. A good read.
